GET https://api.rawg.io/api/games?
parameters:
    key
    genres (genre id/name. can use genres call in rawgtest to get list of genres and their ids. id 4 = RPG)
    page
    page_size
    platforms (platform id. can use the platforms call in rawgtest to get list of platforms and their ids)
    ordering (can order by name, rating etc. -rating denotes reverse rating order)
    search (search query)
